channel.title: DarkQuest 317/618 Looking for staff - Join NOW
channel.description:
Welcome to DarkQuest. We are a brand New Server. Looking for staff. Donate for AMAZING benefits. Hosted on a good VPS. Join Today!
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/1qp8dtupcicrgge/Client_V3.1.rar
Forums: darkquest.freeforums.org/
Here is some of the great features:
Bosses: Avatar of destruction Tormented Demons Corp Beast Penance Queen Godwars KBD Chaos Elemental Dagganoth Kings Nomad Ice stryk's
Minigames: Barrows Castle Wars Zombies Warriors Guild Pest Control Duel Arena Tzhaar Caves
Melee + Correct special attacks on all weapons. + Perfected Dragon Claw special attack. + Correct level requirements on all weapons. + Player poisoning which can be healed with a potion. + Player poisoning which fades away over a period of time. + Hitpoints orb turns green when player is poisoned. + Clipped Combat Following. + Constitution. + Combat icons in front of the hitsplat. + Equipment bonus's and affects: Barrows, Void, etc. + Critical hitmarks with the correct fonts, etc.
Range + Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, knifes, thrown-axe's, etc) + Hand Cannon with RuneScape's maxhit formula. + Correct level requirements for bows and arrows. + Perfected Dark bow, not overpowered. + Crystal bow degrading. + Use of red chinchompa's. + Special attacks on (e) bolts. + Ava's accumulator fully functional.
Magic + Perfected modern spellbook + Correct animations for each type of spell casted. + Correct RuneScape Teleporting + Flawless 'Ancients' spellbook. + Autocasting on Ancients and Modern spellbooks. + Korasi Special Attack (With Magic, Both PvM & PvP) + Perfect Miasmic Ancient spells.
Prayer + Bone burying: Bones, Big bones, Dragon bones, Frost dragon bones + Working Guilded Alter with double XP if bones are used on it. + Reasonable drain rates. + Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil. + Working Bonecrusher. + Quick Prayers: Normal and Curses
Summoning + Working 'Familiar Inventory'(with current Runescape Interfaces) + Your Summoned NPC works in multi-combat areas (Both player and NPC). + Pouch crafting with the correct level, amount of charms, shards, and materials.(with current Runescape Interfaces) + Summon drains overtime with your Familar spawned. + Summoning Orb. + Special attacks on all Familiars.
RuneCrafting + Requires rune and/or pure essence for selected runes. + Crafting: Air, Mind, Water, Earth, Fire, Body, Cosmic, Nature, Law, Death, Blood, Astral + Teleports to the Alter for every rune.
Thieving + Pickpocketing and stall thieving. + Stealing items from stalls, randomly getting caught removing 4-6 HP. + Various items such as rings, fish, cakes, in stalls instead of coins. + NPC's catch you stealing from them and attack you. + Level affects how often you get caught.
Agility + Fully working Gnome Stronghold Agility Course. + Fully Working Wilderness Agility Course. + Fully working ticket exchange for Agile Armour.
Crafting + Stringing amulets + Crafting gems into cut gems + Make 'x' option.
Herblore + Perfect vial filling with water. + Working potions and unfinished potions. + Pect potion mixing. + Perfect drinking of potions and stat boosting. + Potion mixing to make extremes and overloads.
Fletching + Make 'x' option + Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow cutting. + Arrow making (feather + shaft = headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip = arrow). + Bow stringing. + Crossbow and bolt supported.
Slayer + Kuradel gives Slayer Tasks: 'easy' 'advanced' 'master' + Slayer tasks based on your combat level. + Slayer Tower, set up like real RuneScape. + Various bosses such as Jad and King Black Dragon assigned as Slayer Tasks. + Various monster's with different XP rates to level the Slayer skill.
Hunter + All hunter gear with the correct level requirements to wield. + Impling capturing and looting. + Box traps for red and grey chinchompas. + Use of butterfly nets. + Capturing butterfly's in their jar.
Mining + Ore prospecting on all mining rocks. + Better pickaxes as well as higher mining levels affect Mining rates. + Various respawn delays on higher level rocks. + Gems found randomly whilst mining. + Dragon pickaxe support with the correct item animation and GFx. + Living mineral mining.
Smithing + Perfect bar smelting using bar selection interface. + Make all option fixed with a delayed timer along with animation. + Perfected item and level requirement upon smithing certain bars. + Dragonfire shield making. + Dragon platebody making.
Fishing + All fish may be caught in their correct location with the correct equipment. + Nets fully functional. + Lobster cages fully functional. + Harpoons fully functional. + Fly fishing and bait fishing fully functional. + Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught. + Fishing rocktail. + Living mineral bait. + Barbarian fishing at level 96.
Cooking + Cook-able foods can be cooked on a fire or range. + Food burning based on our cooking level. + Food cooking with the correct animation and timer between each item of food. + Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate. + Finished all cooking level requirements.
FireMaking + All logs have proper requirements to be lit. + All logs may be burned. + All players can see fires. + Fairly fast XP rate (Doesn't produce money) + Clipped Firemaking
WoodCutting + All trees working. + Randomized tree respawn. + Better hatchets increase the rate you get logs. + Correct hatchet level requirements. + Random chance at getting a bird's nest containing various seeds or summoning pets (Hawks, Raven's, etc)
Donator Zone [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rndn61.png[/img]
Corp [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/15gs0na.png[/img]
Teleports [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2v0o9xg.png[/img]
Come join us!!!!

item.title: DarkQuest 317/618 Looking for staff - Join NOW
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Vigour:

Donate for AMAZING benefits.

With you saying that, it makes it seem that you’re money hungry and want to make money off of a private server. You don’t even have a proper fucking website and you want people to donate?

Read full topic
item.source: DarkQuest 317/618 Looking for staff - Join NOW

item.title: DarkQuest 317/618 Looking for staff - Join NOW
item.dc:creator: @Vigour Vigour
item.description:
@Vigour wrote:

Welcome to DarkQuest. We are a brand New Server. Looking for staff. Donate for AMAZING benefits. Hosted on a good VPS. Join Today!

Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/1qp8dtupcicrgge/Client_V3.1.rar

Forums: darkquest.freeforums.org/

Here is some of the great features:

Bosses:
Avatar of destruction
Tormented Demons
Corp Beast
Penance Queen
Godwars
KBD
Chaos Elemental
Dagganoth Kings
Nomad
Ice stryk’s

Minigames:
Barrows
Castle Wars
Zombies
Warriors Guild
Pest Control
Duel Arena
Tzhaar Caves

Melee

  • Correct special attacks on all weapons.
  • Perfected Dragon Claw special attack.
  • Correct level requirements on all weapons.
  • Player poisoning which can be healed with a potion.
  • Player poisoning which fades away over a period of time.
  • Hitpoints orb turns green when player is poisoned.
  • Clipped Combat Following.
  • Constitution.
  • Combat icons in front of the hitsplat.
  • Equipment bonus’s and affects: Barrows, Void, etc.
  • Critical hitmarks with the correct fonts, etc.

Range

  • Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, knifes, thrown-axe’s, etc)
  • Hand Cannon with RuneScape’s maxhit formula.
  • Correct level requirements for bows and arrows.
  • Perfected Dark bow, not overpowered.
  • Crystal bow degrading.
  • Use of red chinchompa’s.
  • Special attacks on (e) bolts.
  • Ava’s accumulator fully functional.

Magic

  • Perfected modern spellbook
  • Correct animations for each type of spell casted.
  • Correct RuneScape Teleporting
  • Flawless ‘Ancients’ spellbook.
  • Autocasting on Ancients and Modern spellbooks.
  • Korasi Special Attack (With Magic, Both PvM & PvP)
  • Perfect Miasmic Ancient spells.

Prayer

  • Bone burying: Bones, Big bones, Dragon bones, Frost dragon bones
  • Working Guilded Alter with double XP if bones are used on it.
  • Reasonable drain rates.
  • Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil.
  • Working Bonecrusher.
  • Quick Prayers: Normal and Curses

Summoning

  • Working ‘Familiar Inventory’(with current Runescape Interfaces)
  • Your Summoned NPC works in multi-combat areas (Both player and NPC).
  • Pouch crafting with the correct level, amount of charms, shards, and materials.(with current Runescape Interfaces)
  • Summon drains overtime with your Familar spawned.
  • Summoning Orb.
  • Special attacks on all Familiars.

RuneCrafting

  • Requires rune and/or pure essence for selected runes.
  • Crafting: Air, Mind, Water, Earth, Fire, Body, Cosmic, Nature, Law, Death, Blood, Astral
  • Teleports to the Alter for every rune.

Thieving

  • Pickpocketing and stall thieving.
  • Stealing items from stalls, randomly getting caught removing 4-6 HP.
  • Various items such as rings, fish, cakes, in stalls instead of coins.
  • NPC’s catch you stealing from them and attack you.
  • Level affects how often you get caught.

Agility

  • Fully working Gnome Stronghold Agility Course.
  • Fully Working Wilderness Agility Course.
  • Fully working ticket exchange for Agile Armour.

Crafting

  • Stringing amulets
  • Crafting gems into cut gems
  • Make ‘x’ option.

Herblore

  • Perfect vial filling with water.
  • Working potions and unfinished potions.
  • Pect potion mixing.
  • Perfect drinking of potions and stat boosting.
  • Potion mixing to make extremes and overloads.

Fletching

  • Make ‘x’ option
  • Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow cutting.
  • Arrow making (feather + shaft = headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip = arrow).
  • Bow stringing.
  • Crossbow and bolt supported.

Slayer

  • Kuradel gives Slayer Tasks: ‘easy’ ‘advanced’ ‘master’
  • Slayer tasks based on your combat level.
  • Slayer Tower, set up like real RuneScape.
  • Various bosses such as Jad and King Black Dragon assigned as Slayer Tasks.
  • Various monster’s with different XP rates to level the Slayer skill.

Hunter

  • All hunter gear with the correct level requirements to wield.
  • Impling capturing and looting.
  • Box traps for red and grey chinchompas.
  • Use of butterfly nets.
  • Capturing butterfly’s in their jar.

Mining

  • Ore prospecting on all mining rocks.
  • Better pickaxes as well as higher mining levels affect Mining rates.
  • Various respawn delays on higher level rocks.
  • Gems found randomly whilst mining.
  • Dragon pickaxe support with the correct item animation and GFx.
  • Living mineral mining.

Smithing

  • Perfect bar smelting using bar selection interface.
  • Make all option fixed with a delayed timer along with animation.
  • Perfected item and level requirement upon smithing certain bars.
  • Dragonfire shield making.
  • Dragon platebody making.

Fishing

  • All fish may be caught in their correct location with the correct equipment.
  • Nets fully functional.
  • Lobster cages fully functional.
  • Harpoons fully functional.
  • Fly fishing and bait fishing fully functional.
  • Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught.
  • Fishing rocktail.
  • Living mineral bait.
  • Barbarian fishing at level 96.

Cooking

  • Cook-able foods can be cooked on a fire or range.
  • Food burning based on our cooking level.
  • Food cooking with the correct animation and timer between each item of food.
  • Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate.
  • Finished all cooking level requirements.

FireMaking

  • All logs have proper requirements to be lit.
  • All logs may be burned.
  • All players can see fires.
  • Fairly fast XP rate (Doesn’t produce money)
  • Clipped Firemaking

WoodCutting

  • All trees working.
  • Randomized tree respawn.
  • Better hatchets increase the rate you get logs.
  • Correct hatchet level requirements.
  • Random chance at getting a bird’s nest containing various seeds or summoning pets (Hawks, Raven’s, etc)

Donator Zone

Corp

Teleports

Come join us!!!

Read full topic
item.source: DarkQuest 317/618 Looking for staff - Join NOW
